# Instructions for Copilot

# Rules
- Use conventional commit messages when making changes to the codebase. Use the following format: `<type>(<scope>): <description>`, where `<type>` is one of `feat`, `fix`, `docs`, `style`, `refactor`, `perf`, `test`, `chore`, and `<scope>` is a noun describing the area of the codebase affected by the change. For example: `feat(components): add new FL3X Device-LÂ² component`
